roleset.name: light a controled fire in the path of a wild fire to gain control

example.name: backburn-v
example.text: Fire crews are continuing to backburn at The Cape, near Charters Towers, and expect to have that fire contained by this afternoon.
example.arg: at The Cape, near Charters Towers,

example.name: backburn-v
example.text: Wtihin minutes there were 3-4 helicopters doing bucket work and the fire team backburned the fire into itself that night.

example.name: backburn-v
example.text: Crews backburned the forest there earlier in the week to try to remove fuels and stop the fire's progress.
example.arg: to try to remove fuels and stop the fire's progress.

example.name: do_backburn-l
example.text: 'Simmo, I want you to go to the intersection near the houses and do a backburn to clear the east side of the road.
example.arg: to clear the east side of the road.

example.name: back-burn-n
example.text: Had it not been for the back-burning along the Jamieson Track ...

roleset.note: BACKBURN-V, BACKBURN-N NOTES: Added by Julia for Lorelei.
